articles.title: Why RTX (RTX) Is Up 5.2% After Spain’s Record US$1.7 Billion Patriot System Order – And What’s Next
articles.mainIdea: Why RTX (RTX) Is Up 5.2% After Spain’s Record US$1.7 Billion Patriot System Order – And What’s Next
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Why RTX (RTX) Is Up 5.2% After Spain’s Record US$1.7 Billion Patriot System Order – And What’s Next. Earlier this week, Raytheon, an RTX business, secured a US$1.70 billion foreign military sales contract to supply Spain with four Patriot air and missile defense systems, including radars, launchers, command-and-control stations and training equipment. This is Spain’s largest Patriot order to date, reinforcing RTX’s position as a key supplier of integrated air and missile defense capabilities to U.S. allies. Next, we’ll examine how Spain’s record Patriot order could influence RTX’s defense...

articles.title: Leak Hints at First Intel Nvidia Chip After $5 Billion Partnership
articles.mainIdea: Leak Hints at First Intel Nvidia Chip After $5 Billion Partnership
articles.summary: GuruFocus.com: Leak Hints at First Intel Nvidia Chip After $5 Billion Partnership. Intel (INTC, Financials) and Nvidia (NVDA, Financials) may be preparing to ship their first jointly developed chip, according to leaked details about a laptop processor called Serpent Lake. The leak, shared by YouTube channel RedGamingTec, suggests the chip will combine Intel CPUs with Nvidia RTX graphics in a single design. Serpent Lake is expected to pair Intel's upcoming Titan Lake CPU architecture with Nvidia's RTX Rubin graphics, manufactured on TSMC's 3-nanometer process. Related tickers mentioned: AMD, INTC, NVDA, TSM.
